title: Paysafecard for Oce RP.
body:
Hello fellows, my friend had purchased a paysafecard that is of $10 in value. He was told that the currency would just convert but unfortunately, League didn't support USD paysafecards. So if there are any interested fellows out there, I am willing to trade my paysafecard $10 usd (which can be used in Steam as it supports USD) for a $10 League of Legends RP card for the OCEANIC region.
Cheers everyone!

replies.body:
Hiya :)

Have you tried submitting a ticket to Riot Support? You can do so here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I hope this helps :D
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
